Name: Daily Crypto

Name: Projectr

Also, the number of travel product suppliers can be increased at any moment; no additional developments will be needed. The XML-interface of the GP HUB is based on the Open Travel Alliance standard, www.opentravel.org, noted for its reliability and security.

Name: Velocipedia

Name: Caret

With Caret you are able to Personalize presence info with automated context & interactive B2C/B2B services.With the Caret App you can: Assign real time statuses to phone numbers for sharing with contacts See when & why contacts are available or busy Manage what contacts see about you Call & end-to-end encrypted status based messaging for free Create custom statuses to meet your business needs Discover your contacts' interests in real timeThe app is available for free for iOS, Anrdoid, and Amazon devices.

Name: Domain Rank Checker
Description: The Domain Rank Checker is designed to uncover the keywords that drive most organic traffic to your website. Or you can use this tool to perform competitor research and discover what keywords your competitor is targeting and ranking for.

Name: Bird search

Search tool on twitter is a gold mine for surfacing the most valuable tweets, whether it's the top tweets, most engaged tweets, viral tweets, tweets from specific users, media, news etc, it makes it easier to separate the signal substance from the noise. However, Twitter search has been stagnant for many years in terms of refining the search, the UX and one cannot construct their own advanced search queries on mobile, which is where Bird search comes in.

Name: Kitchen Quest

Name: Honeygain

Name: Gif-News
Description: Gif News pulls the top 20 popular news articles from the New york Times and queries Giphy for a relevant gif, so you can TLDR;

Name: Api Expert - MyMemory Language Translator

Name: Onro

Among them are the following:Driver appCustomer appDispatch panelAdmin panelAPIOnro also has a pay-as-you-go pricing model, and customers pay as much as they consume.

Name: Convert Cat

The following formats for conversions are supported on Convert Cat: images, documents, eBooks, music, and video, with more than 1000 format-to-format combinations. Users can choose files from their desktop and the preferred extension type (pdf, png, text, etc.). Convert Cat will process uploaded files and will send the results to the user's specified email. Convert Cat also enables images located at URLs to be converted and downloaded as various file formats as well.

Name: Antideo

We are keeping our database updated regularly from various sources, as well as collecting some of the data ourselves. Final result is millions of IP and email records kept up to date and free to use in a fair manner.

Name: GIPHY and Twilio "Text a GIF"
Description: A combination of a GIPHY and Twilio script that runs in the Terminal that texts someone a GIF based on a user-inputed phrase.This project was built by exporting JavaScript code snippets from RapidAPIs GIPHY and Twilio API packages. You can recreate this app in your preferred language by filling in the parameters on RapidAPI and exporting the snippet in the language of your choice (ex. Python, PHP, Java, Objective-C and cURL).You can also find the source code on GitHub.

Name: iBeeKing

Bluetooth beacons are supported by The Beacon Registry API., which allows providers to create and maintain a registration record for the UUID/major/minor combination of any Bluetooth Low Energy device, including iBeacons.

The software boasts a rich yet simple user interface with an impressive set of the image library. It is essentially a SAAS-based tool that can be availed without any obligation of a license for the lifetime.

Name: SAP FICO Jobs

Name: ClickUp

They offer a free tier as well as a per-user pricing structure for more storage, integration, onboarding, and reporting.

UCIC (Unified Computer Intelligence Corporation) is an IT firm based in Toronto, Canada.

This web app is helpful whether you are experienced or an entry level graduate and would like to build a career within the software industry.

Name: IFTTT

Name: Api Expert - Stack Overflow

Name: Recruit CRM

A straightforward kanban view for both sales & recruitment, email triggers & boolean search makes Recruit CRM the absolute best option for agencies.

Name: AT&T Drive Mode for Android
Related APIs: AT&T In-App Messaging, AT&T Call Management
Description: Everyone knows that texting and driving is dangerous, yet, when a text message comes in, it's difficult not to respond. AT&T DriveMode is a free* app that silences incoming text message alerts so you can stay focused while driving. To get the full benefits of this app, you must be an AT&T customer.Avoid distractions while driving: Silences text message alerts Automatically replies to text messages Turns on when the vehicle is moving Access music and navigation with one touchHelps to keep young drivers safe by sending a text message to a parent if: AT&T DriveMode is turned off Auto-Mode is disabled New speed-dial number is added Note: Parental Alerts can be sent to AT&T mobile numbers only.A compatible device is required. With DriveMode for iPhone: Auto-Reply feature available for AT&T customers only. Auto-replies to SMS and MMS only and not iMessages or messages sent by third-party services. iOS Auto-Reply: Requires active AT&T Message Backup & Sync service. Will not send auto-replies to phone calls. Other functionalities such as routing calls to voicemail, blocking incoming calls, and blocking outgoing SMS messages are not available. General: Technical, network and other service restrictions may apply.* Data and text messaging rates apply for download and usage, including Auto-Replies.

Name: AllFlicks

Name: Goodneighbor

Name: DigiBoxx - Indian file sharing app

Description: Find great deals on a wide range of different pc game hardware, accessories and video games.

Name: Image Upscaler
Description: Image Upscaler - https://imageupscaler.com - is a smart tool to upscale image without losing quality. When we work with image enlargement we usually meet problems with creating new pixels that have been added. Standard approach gives a blur effect in the image, if we estimate pixels as average of neighbouring pixels. And in that case the image looks like a stretched image and it has a blur effect. In the approach on Image Upscaler website we use Deep Learning GAN - generative adversarial network to approximate pixels. In this approach images save their quality, they have no blur effect and look more natural like in the real world if you take photos with a better camera or with smaller distance. At the first stage, GAN Generative Adversarial Networks have been trained on high photo databases. It helps the algorithm to understand how the natural object looks in real life. When you upload an image, AI Image Upscaler scans it, and generates new pixels for bigger images, and these pixels look like they should be in the real world. As a result, you get a higher resolution image.You can upscale images in JPG, JPEG, PNG formats. Image Upscaler works with any image, but you will get a better result using photos that were not previously blurred or upscaled. The website shows better results on anime, logos, cartoon pictures, or any other synthesized image.

Sure, click THE VINES to watch it playlisted...Under tweets feel free to check what's top on Amazon by random category (at the moment from 10 available global locations)!Just under Random Pics spoiler are random space cats pics (for your pleasure).

Name: triage.me
Related APIs: Google Maps, Bit.ly, Twilio, Google Maps Data
Description: ED misuse is one of the largest problems healthcare organizations face today. Nationally, there were 124 million ED visits in 2011, of which the CDC estimates 50% could be handled in a primary care setting. With an average charge for each ED encounter approaching $700 vs. the average physician office charge of $150, every patient redirected away from the ED saves the payor $550. This represents a total potential market savings of $34 billion for facilitating correct use of primary care.Providing people with the tools they need to find appropriate care everywhere saves everyone, hospitals and patients, money and time.Patients receive a SMS from triage.me post emergency room discharge. By sending a text to triage.me with their problem and current address, we route the person towards the nearest clinic, providing the address and a link to directions (for smartphone users).Many clinics that work with the underinsured also often have variable hours and locations. We've made it easy for these clinics to update their hours and location via SMS so that we can better route triage.me users to locations.

Name: Whilewairport
Related APIs: Facebook, Google Client Authentication, LinkedIn, FlightStats, Foursquare
Description: Who said that waiting at the airport should be an atomic bore? Nonsense. As long as you can use a service like WhileWairport, then waiting for your plane is going to be something productive. This service lets you get real-time information about flights and airlines directly on your mobile, and have that shared with all of your contacts on sites like Facebook and Twitter. Which means that if your plane is going to be late, then youll be able to let everybody know about such a thing without having to make a single call, or even send a single SMS. A simple social update will do.And the social scope of this service doesnt stop at that. No, WhileWairport lets you meet up with people who are in the same airport that you find yourself in. You can look for people who share your same hobbies and interests, and have a much more pleasant wait if your flights been delayed.And WhileWairport is useful for finding people to share taxis with, too. Simply make it clear where it is you are supposed to get to, and if theres any matches then the application will instantly let you know as much.WhileWairport.com In Their Own WordsWhileWairport offers services to make the most of the time waiting at the airport.Some Questions About WhileWairport.comBased on the way people are using this service, which airports are the busiest in the world right now?

Name: MiniDates

Along the same lines of speed dating, our phone conversations or "mini dates" are limited to three minutes each. This is enough time for users to meet each other and chat but not too much time in case someone isn't interested or doesn't feel a connection. When the three minutes are up, users are asked if they would like to continue the conversation. If both users say "yes", the connection stays open and they can talk on MiniDat.es for as long as they want. But if someone says "no", the connection is closed and both people go their separate ways. No hurt feelings, no need to "let her down easily" and no awkward, half-hug on your doorstep.

Taken even further, if you are sitting in front of your computer and a thought pops in your head, you can simply click record on DearEmmy.com and your message will be recorded and saved forever.

Web 2.0 practices such as information sharing, interoperability and collaboration and becoming business practices. Description: Printsgram provides printable PDF files from your Instagram photos, with several different layout templates. PDF files are created on standart international paper sizes, so you can print them with your printer or go to a local print store for larger prints.

Name: Tweet Degree
Description: Tweet Degree let's you see who your friends are following and if you should be following them too. Tweet degree uses 3 different ranking factors: Strong Links, Trust Rank & Trust Quotient all provided

Name: iHear Network
Description: iHear Network for Android lets you hear what people are saying in your neighborhood or you can "teleport" to a different location and hear what's going on there.

Name: Hashtagram
Description: Search Twitter hashtags for Instagram photos, displayed in realtime and in a slideshow format.

Name: Tourism Dunedin
Description: The official Tourism Dunedin (New Zealand) website using the MenuMania API. Allows site visitors to view and search for restaurants, shopping, nightlife, art, culture, history and find out what is going on in Dunedin.

Name: RDFaCE

Description: RDFaCE (RDFa Content Editor) is a mashup that brings together different semantic web API's to facilitate semantic content authoring.

Name: Diabetic Alerts
Description: Designed by a diabetic, Diabetic Alerts.com lets you register to receive automated phone calls to ensure you're not falling victim to low blood sugar. If you are in need of help, DiabeticAlerts.com will immediately phone the people who you've selected as emergency contacts one at a time, until the service can successfully connect with someone who can help you.

Name: Wiggleback
Description: History of a day search. Enter a day and sort results by rank, year and name. Filter popular keywords like Birthdays, wars, events, deaths, etc. or use advanced filters to search categories, types and attributes.

Name: Madison Metro Gmail Gadget
Description: This GMail gadget displays real-time arrival estimates of the Madison Metro at a specified stop.

Name: ShopAbout.co.uk
Description: ShopAbout.co.uk is a comparison shopping site based on the Shopping.com API. Search and shop items by category.

Name: Trentter
Description: Trentter is live Twitter trend monitor which provides a highly customizable user interface to visitors.

Tags: Sports, News Services, Social, Reference, Mobile
Description: Smarter Alarm is a personalized alarm that reads sports scores, weather, stock prices, news headlines and other information. This Android app utilizes the FanFeedr API to power sports scores.

Name: New Zealand Topographic Map
Description: NZ Topo Map is an interactive topographic map of New Zealand using the official LINZ's 1:50,000 / Topo50 and 1:250,000 / Topo250 maps. Stewart Island and the Chatham Islands are also covered. Search and locate any landscape feature on the map: towns, streams, caves, glaciers, forests, huts, mountains and more. Share or bookmark results for later use.

Name: Snoopf
Related APIs: Google Maps, Google AdSense, Yelp Fusion
Description: Snoopf helps you find restaurant coupons and gift cards for diners and eateries in over sixty different food types at restaurants nation wide. Search by cuisine or location to find delicious food, great deals, restaurant hours, locations and coupons for restaurants near you.

Name: Raddio.tk
Description: 30-06-2011 JavaScript Updated.Raddio.tk is an HTML5 experimental player that uses the Jamendo.com API to load songs based on selected user tags. Works with Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome and Safari using Windows XP/Vista/7 and Linux (Ubuntu).

Name: Plum.ly
Description: Search twitter bios and location, allowing for searches like "rails developers in austin" and "mom blogger. Results are sorted by Infochimps Trstrank (similar to Klout score) so the most influential people are listed first.

Name: TripIt Share
Description: Allows users to share TripIt trip data via e-mail. This project is an implementation of TripIts API. You must have a TripIt account in order to test this project.

Name: Hotels Near To
Description: Ensure you book a hotel as close to your desired London location, landmark or attraction as possible. hotelsnearto.com shows you all the sights and sounds in the area too. Find hotels in London near prominent tourist attractions.

Name: Find a Car
Related APIs: Google Maps, YouTube, Google AdSense, Oodle, Google Analytics Managment, CityGrid
Description: findacar.us is a place to find new and used vehicles for sale, car dealerships, and reviews from all across the United States.

Name: My Twitter for Thrutu
Description: Share Twitter feeds with the person you're talking to on the phone.

Name: TextWeight
Description: TextWeight is a simple way to track and see your body weight over time. The service will send you a text message in the morning; reply with your weight. Login to the site anytime to see a graph of your weight.

Name: BioVenturist
Description: Open-source biotechnology market research. Relies on Freebase technology to organize the knowledge represented on the site.

Name: News from The Netherlands
Description: Daily news from The Netherlands, using multiple sources such as newspapers, radio and tv. Dutch language news site aggregated by a custom built engine.

Name: Map My Following
Description: Following on the success of Map My Followers, this new Twitter app gives you the ability to see all of the people you follow on Twitter on a Google Map.

Name: YouTube Video Map
Tags: Search, Video, Mapping, Social, Visualizations, Reference
Description: Advanced search tool for YouTube videos using Google Maps. Query results by category, upload date, time, city and keyword.

Name: Suggest Me Movie
Description: Free film recommendation tool. Choose your mood, get movie suggestions, watch trailers, read info, director, cast and user reviews.

Name: PDF King
Description: Provides free PDF ebooks document files and manuals to download.

Name: Last Call Blood Alcohol Estimator
Description: Last Call is a free, easy way to estimate your blood-alcohol level and determine if it's safe for you to drive after drinking. If not, use it to call a cab. Last Call also provides a list of top local DUI lawyers, provided by Avvo, to call for help if you need it.

Name: Loomji
Related APIs: Google Search, Google Maps, Panoramio, Google Geocoding
Description: With Loomji, (re) discovering France, its municipalities and its heritage. Access local information (actual, photos, forums, blogs, opinion) and find your neighbors.

Name: Tubufy.com
Description: Tubufy is a mashup of Spotify (the streaming music service) and Youtube. It allows you to generate dynamic music video channels based on your Spotify playlists.

Name: CheapBoots.net
Description: Selection of cheap boots for women and men from some top brands and stores. Search by Brand, type, size and even boots that are on sale. Easy to use interface and some very low prices on boots.

Name: PayPal for Thrutu
Description: PayPal for Thrutu allows you to transfer money securely between PayPal accounts while on the phone. Awarded 2nd place in PayPal's Developer Challenge.

Name: RAC Member Offers Map
Description: Uses the Google Maps APi and a RAC Membership Offer feed to display locations where people can redeem special offers.

Name: hipfone.me
Description: hipfone.me allows hearing impaired users to recieve telephone calls from anybody in the world. It asynchronously converts a callers voice into text and sends it to the user's chatbox. The user responds with their keyboard and the message is converted into voice and played for the caller.

Name: Freebase Parallax
Description: A novel browsing interface designed for Freebase .

Name: Corobot
Description: Corobot checks tasks from your cohuman (www.cohuman.com) workspace and does them for you - and let's you and your team know when each task is complete. Corobot is available in two products: Corobot Companion is an intelligent automaton who lives within Cohuman (cohuman.com). He's there to help 24/7 with any cohuman-based project - just invite him in and put him to work! Coming in April 2011 will be the Corobot Task Appliance - which is a dedicated environment to turn your choice of cohuman user into a task-completer with full flexibility to customize and program to complete any task of your choosing.

Name: Instant Playlist
Description: Instant Playlist uses Last.fm and The Hype Machine to generate playlists based on what you feel like listening to, then allows you to listen via Spotify.

Name: FreeflowTV
Description: Parkour and freerunning related videos and their metadata are pulled from video sites, spam filtered, stored in a database, tweeted and categorized on Freeflow TV. The videos appear on the website instantly via Pusher. It is also possible to search the database.

Name: Worth of Web
Description: Valuate the worth of any website in this free tool. Find data about earnings, revenue, visits, pageviews and net worth.

Name: noms.in
Description: Youre in a new city, you've only got a day or two and you're obsessed with food. You don't want to gamble on random choices, nor do you want to wade through the 372 recommended restaurants on TripAdvisor or WikiTravel. What if a local food guru wrote up their top choices for the best foods to try, the best market to hit, the best shot of espresso, the best pint in town? What if you had a personal food guide, someone you trust, showing you each of the must-hit spots? Thats what noms.in is: the shortlist for a city, curated by a local food geek.

Name: jQuery Lifestream

Description: Show a stream of your online activity using this jQuery lifestream plugin.

Name: Guido

Name: What's Public

Description: A place to find out what's public about yourself and others.

Name: Rhythm and Blues
Description: New songs and lyrics. Latest music videos and downloads from your favorite artists across the globe. Download songs free.

Name: Fitbit Daemon
Description: Update your Fitbit with Twitter and Nike+ workouts. Receive statistics instantly.

Name: My Flickr for Thrutu
Description: Share a Flickr photostream via phone call. Share each other's photos and public Flickr photos as well.

Name: Compare Prices Discount-Malin.com

Description: Compare Prices Discount-Malin.com: Find and Compare prices before you buy. Find the best price by comparing the prices of our partner shops. Each week find promotional offers ranging from - 20% -80%.

Name: Rolemance
Tags: Messaging, Social, Mobile, Telephony, Humor, Dating
Description: Rolemance makes it easy to spice up your relationship with flirtatious texting. You each control the dialogue, intimacy and outcome with simple A and B choices. Start a rolemance from any phone, anytime you're in the mood.

Name: Thinkbase
Description: Thinkbase is a "Visual Wiki" based on Freebase, an open, shared database of the world's knowledge. It displays the Freebase contents in an interactive graph which allows the user to visually explore more than 12 million inter-connected topics.

Name: Listen Spotify
Description: Share and play Spotify playlists, search and find your music from many different genres. Download all the music you want to hear.

Name: Gametator
Description: Play free online flash games; sports, physics, dress up, puzzle, action, arcade, multiplayer, shooting, girl, strategy games and more. Gametator.com also produces its own exclusive games.

Saves money for people who don't use SMS often; pay only 2c per message when you use Twilio to send or receive SMS. The current version also provides you a way to receive SMS sent to your Twilio number via email.

Name: Like Exchange
Description: likeexchange.net is a website that enables Facebook fan page discovery and helps its members exchange likes with each other.

Name: Streaming Criterions

Name: iEnviroWatch

Name: Mobile Time Tracking
Description: Mashing up Twilio and Freshbooks to make time tracking easier. You call into a Twilio phone number, and it asks you which client you want to begin billing. When you're all done with your work, you call back and clock out. Your hours are then submitted directly to your FreshBooks account, including a transcription of an optional voice note.

Name: Cheap Bulgarian House
Description: Search cheap Bulgarian houses on an interactive map.

Name: NodeNock
Description: Members of the Baltimore Node co-working space can use this call-to-get-in service powered by Twilio and Foursquare.

Name: Waze Button for Thrutu
Description: Share your locations on a Waze map over a phone call. App is in Hebrew.

Name: Localley
Description: Localley is a tool that broadens the functionality of the Facebook Places feature by letting you check in various places using a date and time in the future.

Name: CallMe
Description: CallMe allows you to have one phone number ring multiple lines. Service costs $5 a month; a low-cost alternative for small businesses or to replace a home phone line.

Name: My Red Letter Days
Description: Branded Red Letter Days affiliate site for SEO and PPC. Uses Red Letter Days feed and Google Maps API to map gift experiences by UK locations.

Name: Mi World
Related APIs: Flickr, Google Maps, Google AdSense, Facebook
Description: Provides comprehensive information about the most famous wonders of the world using Google Maps, Google Feeds, Flickr, and Facebook APIs. Recommends wonders users might be interested in based on their input.

Name: HIV/AIDS Prevention & Service Provider Locator

Name: Impact Dialing

By monitoring how many voters actually pick up, Impact Dialing dials multiple lines to ensure that someone will answer almost every call. Additionally, Impact Dialing tracks the length of each conversation, so they can deliver a new call shortly after you hang up the previous one. All you have to do is upload a list of phone numbers on the website. Political campaigns can even use platform phones only, with no computers.

Name: Freebase Sets
Description: Give Freebase Sets some sample topics and it will figure out what they have in common and try to find more topics that match that set.

Name: RouteXL
Description: Route planning mashup for multiple destinations. Finds the fastest route for all locations and sorts waypoints in optimal order.

Name: Geomusic
Description: Visualization of your favorite artists on the world map.

Name: 50 Shops
Related APIs: Amazon Product Advertising, Amazon A9 OpenSearch, YouTube, Facebook, Amazon SimpleDB, Amazon Marketplace Web Service
Description: 50Shops.com allows buyers to tap into the wisdom of crowds to help with their buying decisions. Site users can see which products their friends are buying or browsing and ask other users for feedback.

Name: LinkedIn Labs InMaps
Description: Your professional world, visualized. Map your professional network to understand the relationships between you and your connections.

Name: Google Contacts Integration Tradeshift App
Description: With this App you can synchronize your Google Contacts to be part of you network on Tradeshift

Name: Twitter Birthday
Description: Follow @TwBirthday to be reminded of your friends' twbirthday (day they began using Twitter).

Name: Link TV News
Description: Link TV broadcasts programs that engage, educate and encourage viewers to become involved in the world. These programs provide a unique perspective on international news, current events and diverse cultures, presenting issues not often covered in the US media.

Name: Venmo

Name: Google Maps Weather Mashup
Description: Shows the UK weather forecast for the next five days using Google Maps to find the location.

Name: spofm
Description: Find new releases or just browse on Spotify. Based on your last.fm listening.

Name: Hunch + TinySong
Description: Personalized artist recommendations and instant full-length preview of their songs using the Hunch and TinySong APIs.

Name: busAlert.me
Description: busAlert.me is a mashup of Twilio and OneBusAway real-time tracker service. It's a service that will alert the user by text or phone when their bus is approaching its stop. The service works for all King County (Wa.) Metro stops.

Name: Connected
Related APIs: Google Calendar, Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, Google Contacts, Google Gmail OAuth
Description: Connected is a personal relationship manager that brings your contacts and conversations together from email, social networks, calendar and phone.

Name: Bedmap

Name: Finda Park

Name: Ewelike
Related APIs: Google AdSense, Google Base, Google Books, Goodreads, Google Analytics Managment, Amazon Marketplace Web Service, Facebook Graph
Description: Ewelike is a free product information and price comparison site featuring reviews and commentary written and rated by users. Books, movies, video games, music, perfume.

Name: Snapfinch

Name: CityClash
Related APIs: Google Maps, Google Cloud Translation, Google Maps Flash

Description: City ratings and rankings by people.

Name: Instant Camera

Name: player4you

Name: Allo Sortir
Description: A web application used by members of the French AlloSortir Network (professionals working in the tourist industry and the leisure activities) to develop a regular communication with their contacts.

Name: Twalue
Description: What is your Twitter account worth? Find the influencing value and value of your Twitter account over time.

Name: Twitter Mobile Monitor

It's a simple web app alternative to data apps and a useful to keep away from data collecting. The interface automatically scrolls tweets and updates the query every 120 seconds.

Name: iPicFortune
Description: What do you get when you mix pictures from Flickr or Facebook with Chinese fortune cookies in MyChineseFortune.com? You get iPicFortune. It's a whole new way to view pictures and fortune cookies.

Name: Twitter Multilingual Voice Search
Related APIs: Twitter, Twitter Search, Google App Engine
Description: Twitter voice search in multiple languages. Features include Search-by-Voice, Search-as-You-Type, Real-time Search Suggestions, "Did you say" Speech-to-Text Corrections, Real-Time Update Notifications and 66 Speech-to-Text Languages.

An initial summary view provides a visual alert of under-performing regions and allows the executive to drill down to regional performance. Sales data is further broken down to look at metrics for sales teams as well as individual representatives allowing managers to spot and address potential issues.

Name: SocialBro
Related APIs: Google Maps, Amazon EC2, Twitter, Amazon CloudWatch

SocialBro's technology allows you to download all your community to your PC and browse them even if you are offline.SocialBro will be available as an Adobe Air desktop application and as a Google Chrome App.

Name: Let's Make a Puzzzzle

Name: ChannelAdvisor CRM Connector

Also, in partnership with Cloud Conversion, online retailers are able to leverage the multi-channel specific customer service module provided by eCommSource.

Name: SMS Garage Door

It can tell if the garage door is open or closed and it can also activate the garage door opener if desired. In addition I have a program that runs every 15 minutes and checks the garage door. If it is open past 8:00, it sends my wife and I a text message. We can simply reply to close it.

Name: DailyMotoRide
Related APIs: Google Maps, Amazon S3, Google Visualization, Google Fusion Tables, Google Maps Elevation
Description: A picturesque look at the worlds best motorcycle roads.

Name: Twilirious
Description: You text your message to +1 (415) 895-2220 and it simply appears on the Twilirious timeline.

Name: trends24
Description: A single page interface showing Twitter trends for last 24 hours. View latest tweets and why they are trending.

Name: Routemakr
Description: Provides an easy way to make your own route and share it with your friends.

Name: Music Artists info

Name: SeekATweet

Name: iKnowIt!
Description: iKnowIt! is a simple iPhone app that uses the True Knowledge direct answer service API. Just pose a question and its powerful database will search over 500 million records to give you the perfect answer.

Name: Geoflake
Description: Geoflake collects all the great daily deals from Groupon, LivingSocial, Tippr and 70+ other daily deal sites and categorizes it for you. It's free. Geoflake is currently available in US, Canada and Indian Metros.

Name: Effected
Description: Effected allows users to crop, re-size and apply a variety of Aviary filters to uploaded images and easily post them in your Facebook photo albums.

Name: bookfriend
Related APIs: Flickr, ISBN db, Twitter, LibraryThing, BookMooch, Google Books, Goodreads
Description: bookfriend is an Android application which creates companion guides for any book instantly and seamlessly wherever you are.

Name: statusfeed
Description: Exposes the twitter timeline RSS feed via a private link. This helps to tackle problems with the recently enforced Oauth mechanism. Makes use of the feed in other mashups or e.g. archiving in RSS readers possible.

Name: Canadian Cell Tower Finder
Description: Locate all cell towers and transmitter / receiver stations across Canada. Represents the mobile infrastructure for all Canadian mobile wireless carriers (Rogers, Bell, Telus, Wind, Videotron, etc). Smartphone friendly.

Name: NotifyThem!
Description: Daycares and schools often need to send out notifications to parents quickly and efficiently about school opening delays, closures, weather conditions and other events. NotifyThem! provides an interface to send those notifications out to multiple parents at once.

Name: CloudGento
Description: CloudGento is the first and only complete, channel platform independent, customer relationship management (CRM) solution available to multi-channel online retailers. Companies can now manage all customer service and support operations from a single source and entirely within Salesforce.com.

Name: Japan Earthquake Map
Tags: Events, Mapping, News Services, Reference, Mapping
Description: Map of the recent Japan Earthquake and Seismic Activity leading up to it.

Name: Wherevent
Related APIs: Google Maps, GeoNames, Yahoo PlaceFinder, Google Geocoding, Facebook Graph
Description: Wherevent is a geolocation events search engine. Click on the "Login" button to connect to Wherevent with your facebook account. Find upcoming events and discover who is atttending. Enjoy the best events and share it with your friends. g

Name: I Told You
Description: I Told You allows you to read all of your and your friend's status updates, in one place. You can also read your friends' old statuses, from when you weren't even friends on Facebook. You will also find all comments related to each status updates. Also exports statuses as ebook pdf, txt, doc.

Name: UK rail passenger tweet mashup
Tags: Mapping, England, Transportation, Reference, Visualizations, Social
Description: Rail passenger tweets are plotted on a map, highlighting tweets about delays and cancellations.

Name: Last.fm Ultimate Playlist
Description: Stream your favorite tracks online and listen to stations from your friends on Last.fm. Site is in Czech.

Name: Facebook Search
Description: Facebook Search is a useful search tool for the Facebook social network. It is powered by the Facebook Open Graph API and returns data that is publicly available. Users can search across posts, photos, people, pages, groups and events without the need to login or have a Facebook account. Our service features a unique way to search for images, photos and graphics from the millions of 'Pages' that form part of the Facebook social network. Go further than traditional image search and discover a world of photos and images that have been hand curated by Facebook users.

Name: InstaShirt
Description: With InstaShirt you can have your Instagram photos printed on a shirt quickly and easily. Choose from multiple shirt designs and customized text. Add multiple photos to one design.

Name: Barcelona Bicing mashup with Google Maps

Name: VMAP
Tags: Mapping, Video, Sports, Travel, Nature, Tourism
Description: VMAP is the mecca for Travel Videos. You can explore the world by browsing videos on a map and you can share your travel videos for others to find.

Name: TextSlide
Description: TextSlide is a private community that connects users for one-on-one conversations about anything and delivers them via SMS. Your phone number is never exposed to anyone. The only thing others see are your name, area code and interests. Your interests are used as an ice breaker.

Name: Canadian Skating Rink / Arena Finder
Description: Locate and connect to 3,000 indoor and outdoor skating rinks across Canada. Supports click-to-call app. Smartphone friendly.

Name: PrintCentral and Box.net
Description: PrintCentral is a mobile printing app for the iPhone. Using its integration with Box.net, users are now able to access and print their Box files from within PrintCentral.

Name: Planete Discount
Description: Moteur de shopping discounts.

Name: LyricsGaps.com
Related APIs: YouTube, Facebook, Twitter, Google Cloud Translation, Bit.ly
Description: A fun method to learn and improve your foreign languages like English, French or Italian through music and typing-in song lyrics.

Name: YouTube Cloud
Description: YouTube Cloud is like a tag cloud. Instead of tags, this cloud is based on YouTube video popularity. The bigger the font, the more views that video has had. You can filter the cloud by category and time (today, this week, this month, all time). A video thumbnail preview is shown when hovering over a cloud link. Clicking on the links pops up a dialog to watch the video.

Name: WiiScale
Description: Turns a Wii Balance Board into a Google Health scale. Useful for tracking one's weight over time.

Name: TweetMinus
Description: TweetMinus is a browser extension that notifies you when people stop following you on Twitter. No more wondering if people are unfollowing you. Now you will know. TweetMinus displays your results on Twitter.com, so that you don't have to go to another site.

Name: Viral Music List

Name: Zappos Peer Pressure

Name: Playme Instant

Name: Tim Hortons Store Finder

Description: Valentun.es helps your romance cross wires and wireless. You give your sweetheart's name, a little bit about them and Valentun.es will crawl 5 million songs to find lyrics about them and their interests. Pick out the ones you like, exclude the ones you don't and the app calls your sweetie. Delivers your love note and plays them the custom mix tape you just made.

Name: ActivePrint and Box.net

Name: Helioid Search
Related APIs: Google Search, Yahoo Search, Gigablast, Bing, Blekko, FAROO
Description: Helioid categorizes your search results so that you can find and explore what youre looking for by interactively narrowing your search results.

Name: Top City Books

Name: PhotoMunchrs

Name: Speak

Name: Podbop

Name: BiteFinder UK

Name: GlobeFeed Maps

Name: BART Maps

Name: Japanese Fishing Map

Name: SKMap

Name: Santa Stars

Name: VCarious

Name: CrimeinDC.org

Name: Birds of Central Park Map

Name: MapGasPrices.com

Name: Venues Search from Phone

Name: Indian Matrimony Maps

Name: Zooomr

Name: Stock Cloud

Name: World Airport and Airspace Database

Description: Database of over 11,000 airfields and airports across the world, from major internationals like New York, Paris and London to more out-of the way airstrips like Antartica.

Name: Cute Overload Photos on Phones
Description: This is a mashups of Cute Overload photos and 411Sync Mobile API. Using the search keyword cuteoverload, you can view these photos on WAP capable phones.

Name: PackageMapping.com
Related APIs: FedEx, Google Maps, UPS Shipping, USPS Track/Confirm Fields
Description: Track your packages with Google Maps and RSS feeds! Track UPS, FedEx, USPS, and DHL. PackageMapping.com really works and is free to the public. See where your package is as it makes its way across the map. Check it out and bookmark it!

Name: Yahoo Buzz

Name: Virtual Tourism

Name: mashfot - a mashup about photography

Name: ScreenSvr

Name: popurls.com

Name: Gnosh
Related APIs: Flickr, Amazon Product Advertising, del.icio.us, Google Search, Yahoo Search
Description: Meta search tool from a group of students at Allegheny College. Results from many search engines and social services.

Name: CommunityWalk
Description: Create your own Google Maps with photos, comments, directions.

Name: Panorama Explorer
Description: Tag your photos and place them on the Google Map by uploading them on Panorama Explorer. Search photos by geo data or just exploring the map.

Name: castingWords.com

Name: Revealicious

Name: Silicon Valley VC Funding

Name: RunningAhead

Name: Flyr

Name: Air Travel Emissions Calculator

Name: Similarity Web

Name: Spell with Flickr

Name: RentalMonster Canada

Name: GmapWiki.com

Name: Tiltomo

Name: Iron Skull

Name: Live U Mich Bus Maps

Name: keotag

Name: Metro System in Naples, Italy

Name: Flickrscape

Name: RenewablePlanet.com

Name: socalTECH Venture Funding Map

Name: Geo!Suggest

Name: opsdo

Name: kulist.com

Description: The New York City streets are full of interesting and potentially useful things that have been thrown out. If you see something good, snap a pic, send to GarbageScout where others can go and get it.

Name: vivirama
Description: A housing listings website for all cities of the world. It uses Google Maps to facilitate locating the offers, and RapLeaf to help to create the required trust for transactions to occur. It lets you search graphically by area, even across cities.

Name: TrackBackr
Related APIs: Technorati, Google Search, Yahoo Search, SplogSpot
Description: Cut and paste TrackBack service for blogs and web-pages. TrackBacks are cool, TrackBack spam isn not. TrackBackr finds trackback entries, filters out blog spam and can be added to your blog or web page in less then five minutes.

Name: GeotagIt
Related APIs: Flickr, del.icio.us, Microsoft Bing Maps, ZeeMaps, Yahoo Geocoding, Microsoft Bing
Description: This is a mashup that allows you to visualize geotagged resources on a map. Import your del.icio.us posts or Flickr photos, share your collections and read RSS feeds.

Name: Runway Finder
Description: A flight planning tool for pilots based on Google Maps. Shows airports near your current location, with colour coding for weather conditions reported in METARs, as well as TFR outlines.

Name: Auction Mapper for eBay
Description: eBay API application the gives fast Flash-based search results on a map but is useful for being more search than map. Sliders above map show items on criteria such a price, bids, time, and distance.

Name: Map Game Day
Description: MapGameDay.com is a community site that allows fans to create map markers to show popular campus locations and create custom game day maps: ticket locations, parking, tailgate party, stadium photos, etc.

Name: Earthquakes in Last 7 Days
Description: Real-time, worldwide earthquake list for the past 7 days on Flash-based Yahoo Map.

Name: World of Warcraft Maps
Description: Unusual use of the Google Maps API to control a non-Google map, in this case from the game World of Warcraft. It behaves just a like a Google Map using zoom, pan and drag controls.

Name: Trulia
Description: Search real estate listings at Trulia and see them plotted on Google Maps.

Name: BBC Programmes to iCal
Description: Takes a BBC Programme search and converts the results in to iCal format for use in Google Calendar.

Name: Goocam
Description: This is a Google map of unprotected/open camera streams obtained from Google searches. The IP addresses for each camera's url has been mapped to its Geo-location. Sometimes loads slowly. Some cams NSFW.

Name: Color Fields Colr Pickr
Description: Great way to find Flickr photos by color. Select colors diretly or use the slider to adjust lightness and darkness. By Jim Bumgardner.

Name: Favorite Run
Description: Map your running routes and where to run.

Name: UK Traveldata
Description: Travel advisories in the UK on a Google Map (with BBC Backstage data).

Name: DaylightMap.com
Description: Excellent visualization of current daylight and nighttime regions around the world. Use the Options bar on the right to tune the settings.

Name: fastr
Description: A very fun Flickr game in which you view a set of ten images and try to guess the common tag. Time based scoring.

Name: Smarkets
Description: A prediction market for Amazon products. Each new product added becomes a "stock". If a product's Amazon's sales rank improves, its stock price goes up. And vice-versa. Traders buy, sell, short, and cover.

Name: 50 Top US Medical Schools
Description: Map of the top US medical schools are reported by US News. Pop-up markers show MCAT scores and average tuition.

Name: Map Sex Offenders
Description: National sex offender registry.

Name: Realtime WiFi Map for Montreal
Description: Google Maps mashup of the Iles Sans Fil WiFi network in Montreal, Canada. Note: loads slowly.

Name: Sport Map
Description: Lets you find premiership soccer news by team location. Via Google Maps and BBC Backstage data.

Name: PUMPS.ie
Description: Find the best petrol prices in Ireland via this interactive Google Map.

Name: Planet Hazard
Description: Learn about the unknown hazards around you - the toxins you may be breathing. PlanetHazard maps over 86,000 companies throughout the US that emit hazardous air pollutants. Excellent mashup.

Name: What time is it
Description: Find out what time around the world using Google Maps.

Name: BerkeleyCA crimelog.org
Description: Browsable database of crime reports for Berkeley, California.

Name: UFO Maps
Description: Keep up with the lastest UFO sightings with this combination of Google Maps and data from the National UFO Reporting Center.

Name: Rollyo
Description: Use Rollyo to roll your own search engine. Create personalized search Rolls, share them, and search others. See Rolls created celebrities and add search tools to your site.

Name: Pokermashup
Description: See casinos and other places to legally play live poker on a map. Find the closest rooms sorted by distance, get driving directions and the casino web site.

Name: ESRI Shapefile Viewer
Description: Plots shapefiles on Virtual Earth maps.

Name: Eventsites
Description: Eventsites allows users to create a mini-website for their event complete with description, a Google Map and photos from Flickr. Eventsites is unusual as a mashup in that the entire site is built using only AJAX and it stores no data of its own.

Name: BlogMap
Description: The EVDB (now Eventful) API combined with MS MapPoint creates a mini-map (Feedmap) showing bloggers and events nearby a particular blogger.

Name: retrievr - search by sketch
Description: retrievr is an experimental service which lets you search and explore in a selection of Flickr images by drawing a rough sketch. Very interesting.

Name: phixr.com
Description: Online image editor with basic editing features and Flickr integration.

Name: Map My Run
Description: Allows runners to create and save custom running routes.

Name: Jauntlet
Related APIs: Amazon Product Advertising, Blogger, Google Maps, Yahoo Maps
Description: Jauntlet is a tool for travelers to add travel plans and maps to many popular sites including MySpace, Facebook, and Blogger.

Name: US Top Business Schools Map
Description: Top Business Schools in US as reported in US News and World Report: GMAT Score, Avg Tuition, Avg Salary.

Name: Google Maps + Fast Food
Description: View the locations of over 27,000 major fast food chain restaurants, overlaid on the Google Maps API.

Name: Propsmart
Description: A real estate search engine that aggregating nearly a million property listings searchable with a GoogleMap-based visual interface. Site has budding online community of buyers, sellers, and service providers.

Name: Top US High Schools
Description: Map of the top high schools in the United States as reported in Newsweek. May 8th 2006 issue.

Name: FeatFinder
Description: Explore relationship between artists. Idea based on six degrees theory: no artist is separated from another by more than six other artists. 3rd place winner in Amazon developer contest.

Name: Chicago Bike Map
Description: City of Chicago bicycle route data, on Google Maps

Name: FunBeat
Description: Workout diary and community with integrated Google Maps to let you depict running routes. Account required.

Name: Mysic.com
Description: A shopping service that gives a unique view into the Amazon catalog: Line charts show you price and sales rank over time.

Name: Earthquakes this Week
Description: Google Map of earthquakes worldwide within the past seven days.

Name: Knowcal
Description: UK Local Knowledge - Using data from the directory enquiries database plotted onto a Google Map.

Name: Zip Code Map
Description: Interactively see zip code, city, and county regions plotted onto a Google Map. Also features a reverse geocoder to find the closest addresses to a certain location.

Name: Bubblr
Description: Fun flickr mashup that lets you add cartoon bubbles to photos.

Name: Folkestone Pubs
Description: If you need a pint in Folkestone UK this Google Map can help you find the right pub.

Name: AmazonBox
Description: Display your Amazon wishlist, listmania list or marketplace seller list on your website.

Name: MyGuestmap
Description: MyGuestmap allows your visitors to add pins to a map showing where they are and leaving a message. Create a map to allow your website visitors to place pins, a bookmark-map where only you can post, password-protected maps, and upload photos.

Name: RunningMap.com
Description: Plot a path on a map and the distance is calculated. Locations across North America are supported. Handy measurement tool for running or walking.

Name: Bush History Map
Description: See George W's life history plotted on this Google Map.

Name: Tagzania
Description: Social bookmarking and folksonomies for Google Maps

Name: DeliciousMona
Description: Delicious Mona allows you enjoy your favorite news feeds on your mobile device. A mobile Story Player you can bookmark articles of interest back to your desktop.

Name: SuperVegan
Description: Find vegan restaurants in NYC with this mashup. Markers help differentiate how vegan-friendly each establishment is.

Name: UK Speed Camera Map
Description: Shows locations of speed traffic camera locations in the UK. As noted on the site: this map is not intended to encourage speeding. Of course not.

Name: QTSaver
Description: Uses Google and Yahoo APIs to extract microcontent from multiple sites and allows you to rearrange the excerpts.

Name: Find the Landmark
Description: Test your knowledge of US landmarks with interactive, timer-based Google Maps game.

Name: Habitamos maps
Description: Habitamos Maps combines postings from Habitamos with Google Maps satellite pictures to show a houses and apartments for sale or to rent (Spain). Warning: slow from US.

Name: Risk on Google Map
Description: Play a variation of the classic game Risk on a Google Map. Note: As of Dec 1, 2005 this has been shut down at the request of Hasbro Inc.

Name: smugMaps
Description: smugmug photos overlaid on top of Google Maps.

Name: BBC News Map
Description: See where the latest news is happening in the UK.

Name: Celebrity Maps
Description: Google maps and Celebrity web data combined to see exactly where your favorite celebrity lives.

Name: Daily Mashup
Description: Combines popular items from Flickr, Del.icio.us, furl, and Yahoo News.

Name: 2RealEstate Auctions
Description: Live eBay Real Estate listings with Google Maps. Includes USA Top 100 Bid Count List, along with regional Top 50 Lists.

Name: Flash Earth
Related APIs: Google Maps, Microsoft Bing Maps, Yahoo Maps, NASA, OpenLayers
Description: Zoomable mashup of Google Maps, Virtual Earth and other satellite imagery through a Flash application. Try rotating the compass or building a permanent link to a location.

Name: Amazon Light
Description: Alternative interface to Amazon. Primarily via Amazon AWS, also incorporates del.icio.us, GMail, DropCash, Blogger and a library lookup.

Name: Williamsburger Community Guide
Description: Google Maps mashup helps you find where the hippest hangouts are in Williamsburg Brooklyn.

Name: HousingMaps
Description: The prototypical mashup: Google Maps + Craigslist to create a visual housing search page via dynamic overlays of Craigslist home listings on Google Maps.

Name: ChicagoCrime.org
Description: A freely browsable database of crimes reported in Chicago overlaid onto Google Maps.

Name: Slice NY Pizza Map
Description: Links you to pizzeria reviews at Americas Favorite Pizza Weblog. With fun slice-shaped map markers.

Name: ScriptureMenu.com
Description: Uses the ESV Bible Web Service to display passages relating to a topic.

Name: eBay Motors
Description: Plots auto listings on their map location (Google + eBay).

Name: NYC Marathon Course
Description: See the course of the 2005 NYC Marathon. From Brian Timoney.

Name: Seattle Bus Monster
Description: From the site: Bus Monster is a mashup of Google Maps, King Country Trip Planner, and University of Washington's ITS Web Services, with a touch more added in.

Name: Seattle911
Description: See in real time what's going wrong in Seattle with this great mashup of Google Maps and seattle.gov. By John Eberly.

Name: Flickr Montagr
Description: Automated photo mosaics using Flickr

Name: Jobster
Description: Enter a zip code when you do a Jobster job search and see the locations plotted on a Google Map.

Name: del.icio.us direc.tor
Description: Ajax-style prototype for an alternative web-based rich UI for del.icio.us

Name: GeoURL Yahoo Mapping
Description: Interesting application, or hack as author Premshree Pillai says, that shows you sites close to a given URL. Go to GeoURL.org for more examples.

Name: Blinksale
Description: Online invoicing service that uses PayPal API.

Name: Adactio Elsewhere
Related APIs: Flickr, Upcoming.org, Amazon Product Advertising, del.icio.us
Description: Jeremy Keith combines a variety of personal information from across the web in one place via Ajax scripting and the APIs from Upcoming.org, Flickr, Amazon, and Del.icio.us.

Name: Yahoo Weather+Yahoo Maps
Description: Get the weather via this all-Yahoo! mashup.

Name: Flitter
Description: Mashup of Amazon (for album/book details), Audioscrobbler (for related artists), Flickr (for tagged photos), del.icio.us (for tagged links), Blogdigger (for media files) and Feedster (for matching weblog posts).

Name: NYC in the Movies
Description: Lets you see where scenes from famous (and not-so-famous) movies have been shot in NYC.

Name: Flickr/Tivo
Description: Display flickr photos for your Tivo

Name: onNYTurf Subway Map
Description: Shows the NYC subway system on a Google Map.

Name: Flickr Screensaver WinXP
Description: Flickr screensaver for Windows XP

Name: Los Taco Trucks Unitos
Description: A Google Map for when you need to find a taco truck in Seattle.

Name: San Francisco Bart Schedule
Description: Visualize the San Francisco Bart transit system. Map lets you click on a station and get the next few departures.

Name: EVMapper
Description: Mashup of EVDB event data and Google Maps, with nice calendar browser for paging through search results.

Name: Kosher Food Locator
Description: Keep to your kosher diet with this handy Google Maps mashup.

Name: Backpack widget
Description: Backpack Dashboard Widget for Mac OS X 10.4.

Name: CellReception.com
Description: Leverages a database of 117,000 cell phone tower locations and Google Maps to help you see where coverage is and isn't.

Name: flightwise (formerly fboweb.com)
Description: Lets you search for flights and see the current location plotted on a Google Map.

Name: HomePriceRecords
Description: Combines home sales data with Google maps.

Name: Seattle Real Estate Advisor
Description: Seattle real estate profiles plotted on Google Maps.

Name: Send a fax from PHP
Description: Uses the InterFAX SendfaxEx method to send a binary file such as Microsoft Word or Acrobat PDF to any fax number.

Name: alkemis local nyc
Related APIs: Flickr, del.icio.us, Google Maps, Amazon A9 OpenSearch, Yahoo Traffic
Tags: New York City, Transportation, Mapping, Webcams, Photos
Description: NYC Live Traffic Cams, Yahoo Traffic News, Flickr images, del.icio.us links, and A9 Blockview Photos.

Name: GymPost.com
Description: Fitness facility locator that shows gyms, athletic clubs, pilates studios, and other similar places on a Google Map.
